entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 07:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
